context_bundle.summary: OpenTelemetry: Vendor-neutral observability framework (CNCF). Unified API for traces, metrics, logs. Key features: auto-instrumentation, OTLP protocol, Collector for processing/export, context propagation. Export to Jaeger, Prometheus, Datadog, any OTLP backend.

onboarding.quick_start: OpenTelemetry: 1) Add OTEL SDK to app, 2) Configure OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT, 3) Deploy OTEL Collector for processing, 4) Export to backend (Jaeger, Prometheus, etc), 5) Use auto-instrumentation where available.
common_patterns: Context: W3C Trace Context (traceparent) for propagation

known_errors.error: OTEL Collector: failed to export spans: connection refused
known_errors.solution: Check exporter config, network connectivity, backend health
known_errors.prevention: Use collector health check endpoint, configure retry/queue
